name: Super Mega Space Game! Beta Release (supermegaspacegame)
name_original: Super Mega Space Game! Beta Release (supermegaspacegame)
description:
This version is just test purpose. Some functions may not work. If there is something wrong with layout please try to go portrait mode and then landscape mode again by rotating yor device.

Android and Windows version are here:
https://supermegaspacegame.itch.io/beta-release

Explore space and go for new adventures with this physics based space game! Solve puzzles, collect crystals, improve your spaceship! Finish the story mode and go for multiplayer! Build your own planet! 

This is the beta version of Super Mega Space Game! Play the game and join us with your feedback and ideas! We want to design and complete the game together!  You can download it for free but if you consider donation that would be great support for the project and we have some offers for you:

  • Pay $1 to $15 and get discount for premium full version of the game when it's out!
  • Pay $15 and get premium full version of the game when it's out!
  • Pay $100 and put your name on the list "Monument of Supporters" which is a big rock on the planet surface like Stonehenge!
  • Pay $500 and put your name on a signboard in the game!
  • Pay $1000 and put a custom in game item like a crate with your picture and name painted on it! 
  • Pay $5000 and let's make a custom asteroid with your favorite photos which is buzzing around a planet!
  • Pay $10000 and let's make a complete custom level for you which includes everything you imagine!

Check Youtube videos for more info:
